targets.query: SELECT mean("rxbytes") * 0.8 FROM "net.dev" WHERE "name" =~ /$net$/ AND "host" =~ /$machine$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "name" fill(null)

list.label: host
list.name: machine
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu.usage" WITH KEY = "host"

list.name: net
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net.dev" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "host" =~ /$machine/
